member.name: M:MouldSpecification.AttachedDocsDataEntry.bsAttachedDoc_AddingNew(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the event when a new record is being added to the AttachedDoc BindingsSource. This method ensures that the "ItemID" field is automatically populated with the "ItemID" of the currently selected MAN_Items row.
member.param: The source of the event, typically the BindingSource.
The event arguments that allow overriding the new item.

member.name: M:MouldSpecification.AttachedDocsDataEntry.FormatAttachedDocGrid
member.summary: Formats the attached document document DataGridView (dgvAttachedDocs) by adjusting various properties such as row selection mode, column visibility, and header styles.

member.summary: Handles the CellFormatting event of the DataGridView to customize the appearance of specific cells. Specifically, this method formats the "Browse" column by adding a tooltip and image.

Provides data for the CellFormatting event, including row and column indices.

member.name: M:MouldSpecification.AttachedDocsDataEntry.btnNewRow_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)

member.name: M:MouldSpecification.AttachedDocsDataEntry.RefreshCurrent

member.name: T:CalendarCell
member.summary: Represents a custom cell in a DataGridView that displays and allows editing of date values using a calendar control. Inherits from .

member.name: M:CalendarCell.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Sets the default date format to short date (dd-MM-yyyy).

member.name: M:CalendarCell.InitializeEditingControl(System.Int32,System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle)
member.summary: Intializes the editing control for the calendar cell. Sets the value of the editing control to the current value or to the default new row value if the value is null.
member.param: The index of the row containing the cell.
The initial formatted value to display in the editing control.
The style applied to the cell during editing.

member.summary: Gets the type of the editing control used by the

member.name: P:CalendarCell.ValueType
member.summary: Gets the type of the value that the contains.

member.name: P:CalendarCell.DefaultNewRowValue
member.summary: Gets the default value to use when a new row is added and no value is specified.

member.name: T:CalendarEditingControl
member.summary: Represents a custom calendar editing control used in a DataGridView. It is based on the control and implements. the interface for editing date values in a DataGridView.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Sets the format of the DateTimePicker control to short date.

member.summary: Gets or sets the formatted value of the editing control. The formatted value is represented as a short date string.
